ui.panel.page-onboarding.intro: Are you ready to awaken your home, reclaim your privacy and join a worldwide community of tinkerers?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.intro: Let's get started by creating a user account.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.data.name: Name
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: Hello {name}, welcome to Home Assistant. How would you like to name your home?
We will set up the basics together. You can always change this later in the settings.

Let's set up the location of your home so that you can display information such as the local weather and use sun-based or presence-based automations. This data is never shared outside of your network.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.tit: Do you want us to detect your location?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: We can detect your location by making a one-time request to an external service.
We filled out some details about your location. Please check if they are correct and continue.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.loc: Name of your Home Assistant installation
ui.panel.page-onboarding.integration.int: Devices and services are represented in Home Assistant as integrations. You can set them up now, or do it later from the configuration screen.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.prefe: This includes information about your system.
Details of what you use with Home Assistant
Counts containing total number of datapoints.
Share crash reports when unexpected errors occur.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.need_: You need to enable basic analytics for this option to be available
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.intro: Share anonymized information from your installation to help make Home Assistant better and help us convince manufacturers to add local control and privacy-focused features.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.descrip: Alternatively you can restore from a previous backup.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.name: Backup name
ui.panel.page-onboarding.ais-restore-bac: Do you want to restore your system configuration from a backup?
Log in to the integrator portal:
If you have password protected backup, enter the password:
Select the gate from which you want to restore the configuration:
Restoring configuration from backup... wait for restart
ui.panel.page-onboarding.mob-integration: Enhance your Home Assistant experience by installing our official Android tablet app.
With the application, you can control voice commands from your phone, receive notifications of events at home, control from outside the home, report your location to the gate, etc..
You can also install other mobile application AIS Mob:
